name: Distant X
description:
In Distant X an astronaut is lost in space. Explore planets and solve puzzles to help the astronaut find the way back home.

By using the "Crystal Shard's" found on the planets to create a key. Use the keys to open a portal to get the astronaut back home. Each planet will have a crystal shard. Travel between planets freely to collect these shards.

This is a First Person, Puzzle game and will have one level, which will be expandable into 6 planets total.
